summary: Diff adds Google Play publishing documentation, adds a new “Publish on Google Play” help section to the Start screen, and adds/updates PWA manifest metadata (manifest link in index.html plus a manifest file with required fields and icon sizes). Some requested store asset image files and specific identifier-format guidance are not evidenced in the provided diff summary.

missing_requirements.requirement: Doc includes guidance on selecting a valid app identifier/domain naming format (5–50 chars, letters/numbers/hyphens only) to avoid validation errors.
missing_requirements.reason: The new doc section shown describes Android package name rules (reverse-domain with periods, lowercase, no hyphens) rather than the requested 5–50 character identifier/domain format limited to letters/numbers/hyphens.

missing_requirements.requirement: Provide the required Google Play / PWA asset images (512x512 icon, 192x192 icon, feature graphic 1024x500, two 1080x1920 screenshots) in the repo.
missing_requirements.reason: The documentation references these files as already generated under `frontend/public/assets/generated/`, and the HTML/manifest reference them, but the diff summary does not show any added PNG asset files, so their presence is not evidenced.

hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest focuses on Start screen help text, publishing documentation, and PWA metadata/assets; changes to project tracking/state files are not requested.
Not requested by the BuildRequest requirements (REQ-7/8/9) and appears to be auxiliary documentation/metadata.
